amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibt funds made available in the Act under the heading "International Military Education and Training" from being used to provide training to children under the age of 18 in military exercises or military combat initiatives.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
